items.name: Cosmic Compass
items.description: An ancient compass that always points towards the center of the galaxy.

items.name: Photon Potion
items.description: A glowing potion that increases one's speed for a short period.

items.name: Solar Harmonica
items.description: A musical instrument that can calm even the fiercest of space storms.

items.name: Nebula Necklace
items.description: A beautiful necklace that provides protection against cosmic entities.

items.name: Quantum Quill
items.description: A magical quill that records events even before they happen.

items.name: Galactic Gem
items.description: A gemstone infused with the power of a thousand stars.

items.name: Moonlight Mantle
items.description: A shimmering cloak that conceals one's presence.

items.name: Stellar Scroll
items.description: A mysterious scroll containing the secrets of the cosmos.

items.name: Void Vase
items.description: A container that holds an infinite amount of space within.

items.name: Astroid Axe
items.description: A powerful axe forged from the remnants of a destroyed asteroid.
